stripped_text: Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn and the Runner has at least 1 installed card. Choose 1 installed Runner card. The Runner must take 2 tags or add that card to the top of the stack. Remove this operation from the game.
text:
Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn and the Runner has at least 1 installed card.
Choose 1 installed Runner card. The Runner must take 2 tags or add that card to the top of the stack.
Remove this operation from the game.
title: Threat Assessment
